info.name: Tizio
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Richard Sapper

MATERIALS:
Table lamp in painted polycarbonate. Adjustable counterbalanced arms and head. Lamp included. The innovation of Tizio is its construction: a 230/240V or 12V transformer in the lamp base powers a halogen lamp through rods and buttons. Besides having a structural function, they carry electrical current without electric cables.

INFORMATIONS:
LED Total power 8Wn
warm white 3000Kn
Lighting Output 400lmn
Dimmer
